TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableRow extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Represents the HTML element in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``項目代表資料表中的資料列。The `` element represents a row in a table. 使用類別來以程式設計方式控制``中的 HTML 元素控制項。Use the class to programmatically control the `` HTML elements in an control. 類別可讓您藉由指定資料列中的背景色彩、 框線色彩和資料格的高度自訂的資料表中的資料列的外觀。The class allows you to customize the appearance of a row in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, and the height of the cells in the row. 這些屬性會設定使用， ，和屬性。These attributes are set using the , , and properties. 您可以使用來控制整個資料列儲存格內容的對齊和屬性。You can control the alignment of the contents in the cells for the entire row by using the and properties. 屬性控制的儲存格內容的水平對齊而屬性控制的垂直對齊方式。The property controls the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells, while the property controls the vertical alignment. 使用集合的這個類別中，您可以程式設計方式存取資料表的資料列中的個別儲存格。By using the collection of this class, you can programmatically access the individual cells in a row of a table. 這可讓您控制的每個資料格，為內容屬性。This allows you to control the properties of each cell, as well as the content. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行個體代表的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an instance to represent a row in the control. 擷取自修改資料表和其內容的集合。An is retrieved from the collection of the table and its contents are modified. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/CS/htmltablerowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/VB/htmltablerowvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 這個建構函式用來建立物件，表示``資料表資料列的項目。This constructor is used to create an object that represents the `` element for a table row. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 Tr"常值字串。The "tr" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體用來控制控制，並將資料表放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中列之儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 控制項中列之儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

span.span: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定內容的水平對齊方式中的資料列之儲存格控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性會影響資料表的執行個體所表示的資料列中的所有資料格類別。Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the class. 若要對齊屬性套用至單一資料列的資料格，將設定為該資料格的屬性。To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the property for that cell. 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|對齊儲存格的左邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of the cell with the left edge of the cell.| |`Center`|對齊儲存格的中間資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of the cell in the middle of the cell.| |`Right`|對齊儲存格的右邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of the cell with the right edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 您也可以使用`Justify`和`Char`做為這個屬性的值。You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property. 不過，並非所有瀏覽器支援這些功能。However, not all browsers support these features. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制整個資料列儲存格內容的水平對齊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/CS/htmltablerowbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/VB/htmltablerowbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別之執行個體所表示列的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the row represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示列的背景色彩。

span.span: The background color of the row represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示的資料列的背景色彩類別。Use the property to specify the background color of the row represented by an instance of the class. 您可以指定的色彩，依名稱或使用十六進位值，加上井字號字元 （#），在表單 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255，分別表示色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，#0000FF 值代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (從 00) 紅色和綠色元件，而指定的藍色元件中指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |桃紅Fuchsia|# FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |橄欖色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白皮書White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可用的色彩，以搭配屬性可以決定從列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的資料列的背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the background color of a row in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/CS/htmltablerowappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/VB/htmltablerowappearancevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示的資料列的框線色彩類別。Use the property to specify the border color of the row represented by an instance of the class. 您可以指定的色彩，依名稱或使用十六進位值，加上井字號字元 （#），在表單 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255，分別表示色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，#0000FF 值代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (從 00) 紅色和綠色元件，而指定的藍色元件中指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |桃紅Fuchsia|# FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |橄欖色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白皮書White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可用的色彩，以搭配屬性可以決定從列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的資料列的框線色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the border color of a row in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/CS/htmltablerowappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/VB/htmltablerowappearancevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Cells As HtmlTableCellCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這些物件會表示 控制項中列所包含的儲存格。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the cells contained in a row of the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中列的儲存格。

span.span: An that contains the cells of a row in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，以程式設計方式存取中的資料列的儲存格控制項。Use the collection to programmatically access the cells of a row in an control. 您可以透過程式設計方式新增、 移除和插入集合中的資料格。You can programmatically add, remove, and insert cells in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有任何空白資料列中所定義的儲存格會傳回物件。If there are no cells defined in a row, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合來逐一查看的資料列所表示儲存格物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to iterate through the cells of a row, represented by an object. 儲存格則會更新以新的內容。The cells are then updated with new content. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/CS/htmltablerowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/VB/htmltablerowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格的高度 （以像素為單位）類別。Use the property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的高度。All cells in the row share the same height. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的高度都太小，才能在資料表的資料列中顯示的資料格內容時，會忽略這個屬性。If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cells in the row of a table, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的資料列的高度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the height of a row in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供其他格式設定之前和之後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 其他格式設定可讓控制項的呈現 HTML 容易藉由加入傳回行和縮排呈現之前閱讀控制項的子物件。The additional formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child objects. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供其他格式之後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 已新增的格式化會使控制項的呈現 HTML 結尾之後加入一條線傳回讀取的工作變得更容易``標記。The added formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing `` tag. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中列之儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 控制項中列之儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

span.span: The vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定內容的垂直對齊方式中的資料列之儲存格控制項。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性會影響資料表的執行個體所表示的資料列中的所有資料格類別。Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the class. 若要對齊屬性套用至單一資料列的資料格，將設定為該資料格的屬性。To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the property for that cell. 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Top`|對齊儲存格的上邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.| |`Middle`|對齊儲存格的中央儲存格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.| |`Bottom`|對齊儲存格的下邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 您也可以使用`BaseLine`做為這個屬性的值。You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property. 不過，並非所有的瀏覽器都支援這項功能。However, not all browsers support this feature. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制整個資料列儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/CS/htmltablerowbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/VB/htmltablerowbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]
